bs-readconfirmation-desc: Extension to collect read confirmations for a page
bs-readconfirmation-confirm-read-checkbo: Yes, I have completely read this page.
bs-readconfirmation-api-error-cant-confi: Can't process read confirmation for this page
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-readconfirmation-ca: Notify me when I have open read confirmations
notification-bs-readconfirmation-remind-: $1 would like to remind you to confirm you have read $2.
logentry-bs-readconfirmation-confirm: $1 {{GENDER:$2|has}} confirmed to have read the page $3
logentry-bs-readconfirmation-remind: $1 {{GENDER:$2|has}} asked the user $4 to confirme reading of the page $3
bs-readconfirmation-api-error-not-active: Read Confirmation is not enabled for this namespace
bs-readconfirmation-navigation-link-titl: Shows an overview of all pending read confirmations
bs-readconfirmation-privacy-transparency: BlueSpiceReadConfirmation: You confirmed reading the page $1 (revision $2) on $3
action-readconfirmationremind: remind users that they have to confirm to have read the page
right-readconfirmationremind: Remind users that they have to confirm to have read the page
